songs.title: Marilyn Monroe
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus 1]
When you– When you told me your idol was– told me your idol was Marilyn Monroe, Marilyn Monroe
I thought to myself, "Oh, God"
I thought to myself, "Oh, God, another one, here we go-another one, here we go"
Don't make assumptions I– Don't make assumptions, I never called you a hoe– called you a hoe
But I got a feeling that you– I've got a feeling that you’ve done this before

[Post-Chorus 1]
Oh my, what a night
Oh my, what a night
Oh my, what a night
Oh my, what a night (Night, night)
Oh my, oh my
We just had ourselves– We just had ourselves a hell of a night, night
We just had ourselves– We just had ourselves a hell of a night, night

[Instrumental Break]

[Chorus 2]
When you told me your idol was Marilyn Monroe
Don't make assumptions, I never called you a hoe
But I got a feeling that you've done this before

[Post-Chorus 2]
Oh my, what a night
Oh my, what a night
Oh my
We just had ourselves a hell of a night
We just had ourselves a hell of a night

[Outro]
Oh my, what a night
Oh my, what a night
Oh my
We just had ourselves a hell of a night
We just had ourselves a hell of a night
